cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shio

sentence.kanji: もうちょっと塩を入れて。
sentence.romaji: mou choto shio wo irete
sentence.english: Put in a little more salt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nusumu

sentence.kanji: 誰かが私のカバンを盗みました。
sentence.romaji: dareka ga watashi no kaban wo nusumimashita
sentence.english: Someone stole my bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yorokobu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はとても喜びました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha totemo yorokobimashita
sentence.english: She was very pleased.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yane

sentence.kanji: 屋根にカラスが止まっています。
sentence.romaji: yane ni karasu ga tomate imasu
sentence.english: There's a crow on the roof.

cards.english: plate, counter for plates or helpings
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sara

sentence.kanji: 皿にケーキを載せました。
sentence.romaji: sara ni ke-ki wo nosemashita。
sentence.english: I put the cake on the plate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chi

sentence.kanji: 血が出ていますよ。
sentence.romaji: chi ga dete imasu yo
sentence.english: You're bleeding.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakubutsukan

sentence.kanji: 昨日、車の博物館に行った。
sentence.romaji: kinou kuruma no hakubutsukan ni ita
sentence.english: I went to the car museum yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokuji

sentence.kanji: 今日は上司と食事をする。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha joushi to shokuji wo suru
sentence.english: I'm eating with the boss today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuuhan

sentence.kanji: 夕飯は寿司でした。
sentence.romaji: yuuhan ha sushi deshita
sentence.english: Dinner was sushi.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuushoku

sentence.kanji: 昼食に寿司を食べました。
sentence.romaji: chuushoku ni sushi wo tabemashita
sentence.english: I ate sushi for lunch.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's natou

sentence.kanji: 私は納豆をよく食べます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha natou wo yoku tabemasu
sentence.english: I often eat natto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's choushoku

sentence.kanji: 朝食に納豆を食べました。
sentence.romaji: choushoku ni natou wo tabemashita
sentence.english: I ate natto for breakfast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haizara

sentence.kanji: 灰皿をください。
sentence.romaji: haizara wo kudasai
sentence.english: Please give me an ashtray.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kazaru

sentence.kanji: テーブルの上に花を飾りました。
sentence.romaji: te-buru no ue ni hana wo kazarimashita
sentence.english: I decorated the table with flowers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's megane

sentence.kanji: 彼は眼鏡をかけています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha megane wo kakete imasu
sentence.english: He's wearing glasses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toufu

sentence.kanji: 私は毎日豆腐を食べます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mainichi toufu wo tabemasu
sentence.english: I eat tofu every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokudou

sentence.kanji: 大学の食堂は安い。
sentence.romaji: daigaku no shokudou ha yasui
sentence.english: The university cafeteria is cheap.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sonkei

sentence.kanji: 祖父は家族みんなに尊敬されています。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha kazoku minna ni sonkei sarete imasu
sentence.english: My grandfather is respected by the whole family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaishoku

sentence.kanji: たまには外食しましょう。
sentence.romaji: tama ni ha gaishoku shimashou
sentence.english: Let's dine out occasionally.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meshi

sentence.kanji: 今朝は飯を食べたかい。
sentence.romaji: kesa ha meshi wo tabeta kai
sentence.english: Did you have a meal this morning?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokuhi

sentence.kanji: 男の子が3人もいるので食費がかさみます。
sentence.romaji: otoko no ko ga sannin mo iru no de shokuhi ga kasamimasu
sentence.english: I have three boys so the food costs mount up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokuhin

sentence.kanji: 食品は日曜日にまとめて買います。
sentence.romaji: shokuhin ha nichiyoubi ni matomete kaimasu
sentence.english: I buy my food in bulk on Sundays.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taion

sentence.kanji: 今朝の体温は36度でした。
sentence.romaji: kesa no taion ha 36 do deshita
sentence.english: My temperature this morning was 36 degrees.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nomimizu

sentence.kanji: 昔は川の水が飲み水でした。
sentence.romaji: mukashi ha kawa no mizu ga nomimizu deshita
sentence.english: A long time ago, rivers were used for drinking water.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokupan

sentence.kanji: 朝食に食パンを2枚食べました。
sentence.romaji: choushoku ni shokupan wo nimai tabemashita
sentence.english: I ate two slices of bread for breakfast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furyou

sentence.kanji: 不良品を返品したよ。
sentence.romaji: furyouhin wo henpin shita yo
sentence.english: I returned the defective product.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gendo

sentence.kanji: 物事には限度があります。
sentence.romaji: monogoto ni ha gendo ga arimasu
sentence.english: Every matter has its limit.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokumotsu

sentence.kanji: 人間にとって水は食物より大切なの。
sentence.romaji: ningen ni tote mizu ha shokumotsu yori taisetsu nano
sentence.english: For human beings water is more important than food.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokuyoku

sentence.kanji: 今日は食欲がありません。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha shokuyoku ga arimasen
sentence.english: I have no appetite today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teishoku

sentence.kanji: 昼の定食は3種類あります。
sentence.romaji: hiru no teishoku ha 3 shurui arimasu
sentence.english: There are three kinds of set lunches.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's washoku

sentence.kanji: 私は和食が好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha washoku ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like Japanese food.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youshoku

sentence.kanji: 昨日の晩御飯は洋食でした。
sentence.romaji: kinou no bangohan ha youshoku deshita
sentence.english: Last night's dinner was Western food.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suizokukan

sentence.kanji: ここの水族館にはイルカがいます。
sentence.romaji: koko no suizokukan ni ha iruka ga imasu
sentence.english: There is a dolphin in the aquarium here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seigen

sentence.kanji: 彼女は食事を制限しています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha shokuji wo seigen shite imasu
sentence.english: She is restricting her diet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tansho

sentence.kanji: すぐにあきらめてしまうのが彼の短所です。
sentence.romaji: sugu ni akiramete shimau no ga kare no tansho desu
sentence.english: His weak point is that he gives up too easily.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nomikomu

sentence.kanji: 彼は薬を一気に飲み込んだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kusuri wo ikini nomikonda
sentence.english: He swallowed all of the medicine in one go.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shushoku

sentence.kanji: アジアの主食は米です。
sentence.romaji: ajia no shushoku ha kome desu
sentence.english: The staple food of Asia is rice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakaya

sentence.kanji: そこの酒屋さんでビールを買って来て。
sentence.romaji: soko no sakayasan de bi-ru wo kate kite
sentence.english: Go and buy some beer at that liquor store.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinshu

sentence.kanji: 彼は禁酒しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kinshu shite imasu
sentence.english: He is on the wagon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's you

sentence.kanji: みんなかなり酔っていたの。
sentence.romaji: minna kanari yote ita no
sentence.english: Everyone got considerably drunk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoki

sentence.kanji: 食器を全部新しくしました。
sentence.romaji: shoki wo zenbu atarashiku shimashita
sentence.english: I replaced all the tableware.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagiri

sentence.kanji: 限りある資源を大切にしよう。
sentence.romaji: kagiri aru shigen wo taisetsu ni shiyou
sentence.english: Let's take good care of limited resources.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's setsuyaku

sentence.kanji: 電気や水を節約しましょう。
sentence.romaji: denki ya mizu wo setsuyaku shimashou
sentence.english: Let's save electricity and water.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chousetsu

sentence.kanji: ここで部屋の温度が調節できます。
sentence.romaji: koko de heya no ondo ga chousetsu dekimasu
sentence.english: You can adjust the room temperature here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kashira

sentence.kanji: 彼は一家のお頭だったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ika no okashira data no
sentence.english: He was the head of the family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sentou

sentence.kanji: 先頭の人はプラカードを持ってください。
sentence.romaji: sentou no hito ha puraka-do wo mote kudasai
sentence.english: People at the front, please hold up a placard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryoujikan

sentence.kanji: 彼はアメリカ領事館に出かけたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha amerika ryoujikan ni dekaketa yo
sentence.english: He went out to the American consulate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryoushin

sentence.kanji: 私は良心に従って行動します。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ryoushin ni shitagate koudou shimasu
sentence.english: I behave according to my conscience.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tandai

sentence.kanji: 妹は短大を卒業しました。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha tandai wo sotsugyou shimashita
sentence.english: My little sister graduated from junior college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taishoku

sentence.kanji: 私は今月一杯で退職します。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kongetsu ipai de taishoku shimasu
sentence.english: I retire at the end of this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taigaku

sentence.kanji: 弟は高校を退学しました。
sentence.romaji: otouto ha koukou wo taigaku shimashita
sentence.english: My little brother withdrew from high school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soutai

sentence.kanji: 具合が悪かったので仕事を早退しました。
sentence.romaji: guai ga warukata no de shigoto wo soutai shimashita
sentence.english: I left work earlier than usual because I was unwell.
